channel.title: CVE Feed for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6879, MT6895, MT6983, MT8195
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6879, MT6895, MT6983, MT8195

item.title: CVE-2023-20760|2024-08-02T09:14:40.942Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6879%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6983%2C%20mt8195
item.description: In apu, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07629578; Issue ID: ALPS07629578.
